article_title: Health care bill in Idaho House awaits possible Wednesday hearing

article_metadata.news-keywords: healthcare, medicaid expansion, Idaho legislature, Fred Wood
article_metadata.description: A health care bill in the Idaho Legislature might be heard by committee Wednesday as legislators close in on the end of the session. The bill would move Idaho towards seeking a federal waiver for a Medicaid-funded managed care system for the state’s poor.
article_metadata.title: Health care bill in Idaho House awaits possible Wednesday hearing | Idaho Statesman

og.description: A health care bill in the Idaho Legislature might be heard by committee Wednesday as legislators close in on the end of the session. The bill would move Idaho towards seeking a federal waiver for a Medicaid-funded managed care system for the state’s poor.
